purpose: The email announces the 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications (iMETA 2025), scheduled for October 14-17, 2025, in Dubrovnik, Croatia. It aims to gather researchers, academics, and industry experts to discuss the metaverse's technologies, applications, and implications. The conference will feature keynote speeches, panel discussions, and presentations, providing opportunities for networking and collaboration. It also outlines the tracks and workshops available, as well as important dates for paper submissions and publication details.

evidence_sentences: The 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications (iMETA 2025)

The International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications (iMETA) is to bring together leading researchers, academics, and industry experts to explore the various aspects of the distributive metaverse, including its technologies, applications, and implications for various industries.

Throughout the conference, there will be ample opportunities for attendees to network, share their knowledge, and collaborate on future initiatives that will drive the development of the metaverse forward.
Overall, the iMETA conference aims to provide attendees with a comprehensive understanding of the communication, computing, and system requirements of the metaverse.

List of Tracks: - Track 1: Large Language Models (LLMs) in the Metaverse - Track 2: Native AI for Metaverse Technologies - Track 3: Security and Privacy - Track 4: Networking and Communications - Track 5: Systems and Computing - Track 6: Multimedia and Computer Vision - Track 7: Immersive Technologies and Services - Track 8: Storage and Processing
Publication: IEEE is a technical sponsor of iMETA 2025. All accepted papers in iMETA 2025 and the workshops co-located with it will be submitted to IEEEXplore, dblp and Scopus for inclusion.
Important Dates: - Late Track Submission - Papers due: July 30, 2025 - Acceptance notification: August 20, 2025 - Camera-ready paper due: August 31, 2025
